text:
CodementorX | Senior Mobile Engineers | Anywhere | REMOTE, https://hire.codementor.io CodementorX (https://hire.codementor.io) is an exclusive network where world-class developers can be hired for contractor positions or large freelance projects. We have over 7000+ vetted expert developers, including book authors, top Stack Overflow answerers, popular open source contributors, and engineers at top tech companies.

We’re currently looking for a few Mobile Developers (iOS, Android, Ionic) to work on a specific project.

Requirement: - At least 20 hours per week of availability & Availability to work in US timezones

This is a remote opportunity. We’re looking for both full-time & part-time contractors.

To apply, please go to: http://codemntr.io/apply-hn
